0.2.1.name: wordpress/just-another-author-widget
0.2.1.description: This plugin was concieved, when i wanted the author information in my site's widget. However, none of the existing plugins looked the way i wanted, and all of them were quite hard to modify. So i made another one which is more versatile and easier to modify to your own liking.
